title: [PR] Feature/chroma memory service
summary:
**Problem:**
The current `InMemoryMemoryService` uses simple keyword matching to search agent memories. This means:
- Synonyms don't work ("happy" won't match "joyful")
- Context is lost (keyword matching ignores semantic meaning)
- No persistence (all memories are lost on restart)

title: [PR] Enforce Offline-only & Initialize Gateway
summary: This PR hardens the 'Offline-only' architecture by removing all external API calls from the Python brain and ensuring the frontend uses local assets. It also initializes the TCP Gateway in the Go Kernel to allow local inter-process communication, a critical component of the Tri-Brain architecture.

title: [PR] feat(core): provider error standardization, abort hardening, session budget, and continuous test suites
summary:
## Summary

This PR ships a set of hardening improvements across the SDK core and adds 10 new continuous test suites covering all major feature areas.

### Provider error handling
- Rename `handleProviderError()` → `formatProviderError()` across all 14 providers
- `BaseProvider.handleProviderError()

本 PR 目标是为 Gemini 模型补齐文件读取能力，并打通从消息输入、工具调用到历史写入的多模态传递链路，同时降低日志与上下文中的大体积 payload 风险。

## 主要变更

### 1. adapter-gemini 新增文件读取工具
- 新增 `gemini_read_files` 工具：`packages/adapter-gemini/src/tools.ts`
- 插件配置新增开关：`geminiReadFilesTool`，开启后注册工具：`packages/adapter-gemini/src/index.ts`
- 工具参数支持单个/多个 URL（最多 10
